title: Media playback on emulator should match Phone
body: The phone currently plays a large selection of media formats (MP4, M4V, 3GP etc) that aren't supported in the emulator. This makes apps that use these formats extremely hard to debug.

comments.body: FYI, MP4 and AAC will be supported in the emulator - Vibhor covers this in his tools talk (http://channel9.msdn.com/events/mix/mix11/DVC17)
